metadata.dc:author: González López, J L
Cervera Bravo, P
Cubillo Martín, A
Soleto Martín, J
Rodríguez Durántez, J A
García-Trevijano Forte, J L
López Valverde, S
Navascués del Río, J A
metadata.dc:description: Obstetrical sciatic palsy have been frequently seen in our hospital, but bibliography about this subject is rare, not only in Spanish but also in other languages. We review our experience about this pathology, and if it is possible, to contribute to prevent its occurrence.
metadata.dc:title: Parálisis ciáticas obstétricas: experiencia de 29 años en un hospital terciario.
[Obstetric sciatic paralysis: a 29-year experience in a tertiary hospital].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cirugia pediatrica : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Cirugia Pediatrica
